item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-02-15
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• RT: I love it when people claim that recent blizzards disprove global climate change. Idiots are usually MUCH tougher to spot.(via @Ihnatko) #
  • Wellington Library in New Zealand loves FictFact! #
  • I'm at Starbucks (Brookline/Chestnut Hill) (1154 Boylston Street, Chestnut Hill). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
